Title: Data Encryption at rest
Description: All data within the Trusted Research Environment must be encrypted at rest. This requirement aims to ensure that data is protected from unauthorized access or breaches.

Evidence.Evidence Artifact Example: Documentation of configuration and system security settings demonstrating that encryption at rest is enabled for all data stored within the Trusted Research Environment, including database encryption, file system encryption, and key management configuration. Supporting evidence may include screenshots, configuration files, or audit logs confirming active encryption and compliance with approved encryption standards.
